snippet: Her album, "21," continues to rack up significant sales at a time of year that has been embarrassingly slow in recent years.
abstract: Her album, "21," continues to rack up significant sales at a time of year that has been embarrassingly slow in recent years.
lead_paragraph: Adele's "21" (XL/Columbia) is officially the fastest-selling record in seven years, so it's not a surprise that this week the album tops Billboard's chart for the 15th time. What is notable -- and a relief for the music industry -- is that it continues to rack up significant sales at a time of year that has been embarrassingly slow in recent years.
